Class RMIClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Network.Handlers
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.Network.RMIClientHandler
public class RMIClientHandler extends Handlers
It's the handler of the player using the RMI communication
